attributes.action: stop the investigation to discover who leaked the information that led to the MPs expenses scandal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The investigation into discovering the identity of the mole who leaked the information which sparked the MPs expenses scandal is a waste of public money and is nothing but a witch hunt. The leak was in the public interest, as the uproar that followed indicates. The failure of parliament to accept this is indicative that MPs are out of touch with public opinion and reality.
Wasting even more money on this matter in the current financial climate is not providing taxpayers value for money.

rejection.details: John Bercow has already announced plans to halt the investigation.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
